channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: White House report: The autopen, ICE raids and a year after Butler
item.description: Here are some of the latest stories coming from the White House this week.

item.title: Report: Medicaid Recipients The GOP Made Work Part-Time Watch TV And ‘Relax’ 6 Hours A Day
item.description: Reestablishing a culture of work via the reconciliation bill represents a hard-earned victory for common sense.

item.title: Minneapolis Mayoral Candidate Says Somalia Is His ‘Home’

item.title: Congress Broke The Military, Now It Must Fix It
item.description: Only Congress can fully undo the mess it made.

item.title: Big Bird Deserves to Lose This Time
item.description: The Trump-backed rescissions bill represents the best chance to defund public broadcasting in decades, if not ever.

item.title: Russiagate Revisited: An Unforced Error that Highlights Russia’s Interference in the 2016 Election
item.description: It is baffling that Trump officials could think it helpful to the president to revisit this ancient history.

item.title: Trump’s Dwindling Patience With Putin
item.description: We welcome Trump’s new realism and hope that it’s enduring.

item.title: Inflation rises in June, in line with economic forecasts
item.description: Inflation ticked upward in June, rising 0.3% in June compared to 0.1% in May, according to a government report.

item.title: ‘Atomic Echoes’ Documentary Highlights The Terrible Costs Of Nuclear War
item.description: Two women interview atomic veterans and trace Japanese souvenirs on a quest to understand their families' ties to nuclear war.

item.title: The 1619 Project Has Failed. Why Do Academics Still Take It Seriously?
item.description: Academic elites set aside their own expertise to promote its political narrative.

item.title: Exclusive: Hundreds Of Ballots Cast By More Than 100 Potential Noncitizens In Texas, AG Says
item.description: It is good officials are still digging into the 2020 election, but it is past time to repair the election process for future elections.

item.title: We Hate Communism
item.description: Please help us fight it in all its forms.
